name: Astralust
description:
CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT!

Astralust is a 3/4 top-down ARPG based in a different universe. The people of Astralust have lived a very peaceful life until something corrupted the islands around Caldrian. Team up with a local alchemist to save the people of Astralust by expelling the corruption from their lands!

Build: 1 level, 2 completable quests, and dialogue for 4 other quests
